name: chatbot_interface

name: text_summarizer

name: image_captioning

name: language_translator

name: code_explainer
question: Create an app that uses an LLM to explain code snippets. How would you do this in Mesop?

name: ai_story_generator

name: text_to_speech
question: Implement a text-to-speech converter using an AI model in Mesop.

name: ai_image_editor
question: Build an AI-powered image editor with features like style transfer and object removal.

name: ai_assisted_writing
question: Create a writing assistant app that uses AI to suggest improvements and completions.

name: multimodal_qa

name: ai_music_composer
question: Develop an app that generates music using AI based on user-defined parameters.

name: document_classifier
question: Build a document classification system using machine learning in Mesop.

name: ai_debate_simulator
question: Create an AI debate simulator where two LLMs argue different sides of a topic.

name: ai_meme_generator
question: Build a meme generator that uses AI to create captions based on uploaded images.

name: ai_recipe_creator
question: Develop a recipe creation tool that generates new recipes based on available ingredients using an LLM.

question: Make a chatbot interface where users can switch between different AI personalities. Show me how in Mesop.

name: ai_interview_simulator
question: Design an AI-powered interview simulator that provides feedback on user responses.

name: text_style_transfer
question: Implement a tool that rewrites text in different styles (e.g., formal, casual, poetic) using an LLM.

name: ai_art_critic
question: Create an app that uses AI to analyze and critique uploaded artwork.

question: Build a personalized learning assistant that adapts to a user's progress and generates appropriate exercises.

question: Make a content generation tool that creates both text and images based on user prompts.

question: Implement a resume builder that uses AI to suggest improvements and tailor content.

name: context_aware_chatbot

question: Design a tool that analyzes customer feedback using AI and generates summary reports.

name: language_learning_game
